com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful

Class TransitionGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.addons.stateful.TransitionGuard
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NoMatchAwareTransitionGuard

    public class TransitionGuard
extends Object
    A transition guard can be used to stop a Transitions. By default, transitions are not stopped. Use a subclass when some transitions shall be stopped.

    Apart from that, the guard is a good place to execute logic that shall be executed during the transition, before the new state is reached. The logic must not be specific to this transition.

    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    rwoo

      • stopTransition

        public MatchProcessorResult stopTransition(State nextState,
                                  StringBuilder characterBuffer,
                                  int firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer,
                                  MatchResult matchResult)
        Parameters:
        nextState -
        characterBuffer -
        firstModifiableCharacterInBuffer -
        matchResult -
        Returns:
        Returns null if the transition shall be executed. Returns a MatchProcessorResult that shall be returned if the transition shall be stopped. If not overwritten, this method returns null.
